title: Simulation Learning for Enhancing Mathematical Creativity Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Theories and Experience in Professional Problem-Solving
context.additional_context: For professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields who must creatively solve complex mathematical problems in practice. Participates in VR simulations on personal devices in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners execute creative thinking strategies at over 80% proficiency in solving math problems using game elements.
Learners solve math problems applied in real professional environments through VR simulations using three or more approaches.
Learners propose five or more innovative solutions through idea exchanges with peer learners during collaborative game-based tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
